Question
========

Which of the following statements ARE correct? 		
		
Answerlist
----------

*  MAPE can be used to compare models performances between datasets
*  IF MASE is greater than 1 then a naive model is better 
*  RMSE is robust to outliers
*  For SMAPE if the actual value or forecast value is 0, the value of error will approach 100%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*  True.
*  False. IF MASE is greater than 1 then a naive model is worse 
*  False. RMSE is sensitive to outliers 
*  True.
